content.html: I'm finding more and more use cases for long/detailed error messages in Node.js. What if we normalized/standardized a `detailedMessage` property containing multiline super-helpful error messages, with ANSI diagrams even. Building support for it into test runners would be cool!
content.value:
I'm finding more and more use cases for long/detailed error messages in Node.js.

What if we normalized/standardized a `detailedMessage` property containing multiline super-helpful error messages, with ANSI diagrams even.

Building support for it into test runners would be cool!
